summary:
The Wii U is a video game console made by Nintendo, released in 2012. It's an upgrade from the Wii, with HD graphics and a unique controller called the Wii U GamePad, which has a built-in screen. You can play games on this screen or on your TV. It's compatible with old Wii games and controllers.

Critics liked its controller and price, but it had some flaws, like a short battery life. It didn't sell well, and Nintendo stopped making it in 2017. Its successor, the Nintendo Switch, improved on the Wii U's ideas.
title: Wii U
